item.title: Cherry add a quote by Gypsy Saying
item.description: "We are all wanderers on this earth. Our hearts are full of wonder, and our souls are deep with dreams." -- Gypsy Saying

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Is sex dirty? Only when it's being done right." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Cherry add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Hold fast to dreams, For if dreams die Life is a broken-winged bird, That cannot fly." -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Nikki Giovanni
item.description: "We love because it's the only true adventure." -- Nikki Giovanni

item.title: Cherry add a quote by José Ortega y Gasset
item.description: "The type of human being we prefer reveals the contours of our heart." -- José Ortega y Gasset

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Russell Conwell
item.description: "You can journey to the ends of the earth in search of success, but if you’re lucky, you will discover happiness in your own backyard." -- Russell Conwell

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Ella Fitzgerald
item.description: "Just don’t give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don’t think you can go wrong." -- Ella Fitzgerald

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I don't want to make money, I just want to be wonderful." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Isak Dinesen
item.description: "We must leave our mark on life while we have it in our power." -- Isak Dinesen

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "You can’t change the music of your soul." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Richard de Bury
Cherry add a quote by William Styron
item.description: "A great book should leave you with many experiences, and slightly exhausted at the end. You live several lives while reading." -- William Styron

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "Reading is the sole means by which we slip, involuntarily, often helplessly, into another's skin, another's voice, another's soul." -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Francis Bacon
item.description: "Reading maketh a full man; and writing an axact man. And, therefore, if a man write little, he need have a present wit; and if he read little, he need have much cunning to seem to know which he doth not." -- Francis Bacon

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Cherry add a quote by James Russell Lowell
item.description: "Books are the bees which carry the quickening pollen from one to another mind." -- James Russell Lowell

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Gustave Flaubert
item.description: "Do not read, as children do, to amuse yourself, or like the ambitious, for the purpose of instruction. No, read in order to live." -- Gustave Flaubert

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "In a good bookroom you feel in some mysterious way that you are absorbing the wisdom contained in all the books through your skin, without even opening them." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "Hope Smiles from the threshold of the year to come, Whispering 'it will be happier'..." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Cherry add a quote by Richard Evans
item.description: "It is often in the darkest skies that we see the brightest stars." -- Richard Evans
